first_translate: did they finally break up?
uh...
it seems they’re still going strong!
gunter’s mercenary group’s lodging house
what?! bigger than a squirrel?!

hangle: 좀 더 제대로 언질이라도 주지 그랬어?!
first_translate: wouldn’t it have been better if he’d given us more details about what we’ll be facing?!
and after that...
I heard they got into a big argument over this!

hangle: 본래 연인 사이의 일에 끼면 머리만 아플 뿐이잖아.
first_translate: but why do you care so much? don’t bother yourself with other people’s business.
fine.
let’s just focus on our mission today.
a mission?
to put it bluntly...
captain! there's some woman here for him!
she really is pretty!
is she his girlfriend or something?
his girlfri--
be careful how you speak around her.
or else your head might roll off your shoulders.
the prince
the prince’s lover
that makes sense.
come on, captain... stop being such a softie!

hangle: 권터 말 듣는 게 좋을 거야.
first_translate: listen to gunter. he knows best.
for someone dating the captain, you’ve certainly got spunk.

hangle: 얼굴은 곱게 자란 아가씨처럼 생겨서 그렇게 안 보이는―.
first_translate: you look like a proper young lady, but I guess appearances can be deceiving--
I’m actually their client.
o-oh, right.
do you know how expensive hiring us costs?

hangle: 의뢰주랍시고 거들먹거리다가 즉시 발 돌린 녀석들도 꽤 된다고!
first_translate: we've seen plenty of clients act all high-and-mighty before backing down at the last minute!

hangle: 보아하니 아직 대장이 의뢰 수락도 안 한 것 같은데―.
first_translate: from where I stand, though, it doesn’t seem as if the captain has accepted your request yet.
really?
then let me correct myself.
I am not just any ordinary client.
...a rich one with power.
she bought out the entire company...
nobles are always so extravagant...
until when would you need them?
my bad...
pfft
of course,
until duke abel returns home safely.
siegren,
what happened between you and gunter back in the day?
nothin' special.
lies!!

hangle: 그보다 용건이 끝나자마자 바로 떨어져서 여기까지 달려오다니,
first_translate: anyway, running away from me like that was uncalled for.
especially since you came looking for me as soon as you finished talking to those men.

hangle: 내 품에서 다른 남자 이름을 외치질 않나,
first_translate: not only did you call another man’s name while in my arms,
but now I also feel like an abandoned mistress.
I mean, I already gave you both my body and heart.
kwo--

hangle: 권터 때문이 아니라 아벨이 중요해서 그런 거야!
first_translate: this isn’t about gunter! it’s about finding abel!
I know.

hangle: 거기 돈 많고 높으신 분들, 연애는 나가서 해라.
first_translate: take your romance elsewhere, miss moneybags.
your grace!

hangle: 제론, 기다렸죠. 눈보라가 치기 시작해서 마차를 두고 먼저 올라왔어요.
first_translate: jeron! thank goodness you made it. I left the carriage behind due to the sudden snowstorm.
thank god you appear healthy.

hangle: 오래 인사할 시간이 없으니 우선 안으로 들어갈까요?
first_translate: now, shall we go inside first? time is ticking.
as you wish, your grace.
welcome back to hailon.
even though I used to hate the cold,
the familiar scent of winter tickled my nose.
abel may no longer be here,
but coming back feels like returning home.
okay, please tell me everything.
a dragon appeared.

hangle: 남은 세 마리 중 한 마리가요?
first_translate: one of the three remaining dragons?
no...
there were two.
what...?
wait, does that mean abel went hunting again--?

hangle: 설마 아벨이 잡으러 간 건 아니겠지.
first_translate: please tell me he didn’t try to hunt two dragons by himself.

hangle: 아무리 아벨이라도 동시에 두 마리는 절대 무리라는 것을 몰랐을 리 없는데?
first_translate: even abel wouldn’t dare attempt such a feat alone.
no, he wasn’t trying to slay them.
more precisely speaking, he wanted to investigate further.

hangle: 용들이 나타난 것은 헤일론을 둘러싼 산맥입니다.
first_translate: the dragons appeared near the mountains surrounding hailon.

hangle: 그 때문인지 산맥에서부터 마물의 습격도 기하급수적으로 늘었고요.
first_translate: and ever since then, demonic attacks have increased exponentially.

hangle: 공작님께서는 물론 헤일론의 방어에 온 힘을 다하셨습니다만…
first_translate: duke abel tried his best to defend the city,

hangle: 이런 식으로는 끝이 없겠다고 판단하신 것 같습니다.
first_translate: but he probably realized that things couldn’t continue this way forever.

hangle: 게다가 척후조에게 두 용이 싸우고 있다는 보고가 왔거든요.
first_translate: on top of that, scouts reported seeing the two dragons fighting each other.

hangle: 시그렌, 네가 잡은 용은 혹시 지성과 이성을 가지고 있었어?
first_translate: siegren, did the dragon you killed possess intelligence and reason?

hangle: 아니, 마물을 상대하는 것과 크게 다르지 않았어.
first_translate: nope, it was basically like dealing with monsters.
fiona, what’s wrong?
I think I understand somewhat...
no, nevermind.
jeron, how’s the defense wall holding up?

hangle: 저와 시그렌이 공작님을 찾아 올 때까지 버틸 수 있겠어요?
first_translate: can it withstand until siegern and I find father?
it'll barely hold, but yes.

hangle: 일단 제가 데려온 용병단을 투입해 주세요.
first_translate: first, send the mercenaries I brought along to help fortify the walls.

hangle: 수색대에 필요한 보급품들도 함께 준비했으니 적재적소에 사용해 주시고요.
first_translate: I prepared supplies needed for the search party too, so use them wisely.
right away, your grace!

hangle: 이미 아벨이 실종된 지 며칠이 지났다.
first_translate: several days have passed since abel disappeared.
bringing food and supplies...

hangle: 준비 없이 무작정 오지 않은 것은 잘한 일이야.
first_translate: ...was definitely the right thing to do.
at least everyone won’t starve anymore.

hangle: 하지만 이제 조사단이 가져간 식량의 남은 양도 얼마 되지 않겠지.
first_translate: still, I bet whatever rations the investigation team took aren’t enough either.
in fact, this whole situation...
